news.title: Crypto lender Celsius is being investigated by multiple states after transactions freeze
news.description: Crypto lender Celsius Network opted to freeze customer withdrawals and other transactions on Sunday, leaving its nearly two million users unable to access their funds. Now, state security boards in Alabama, Kentucky, New Jersey, Texas and Washington have laun…

news.title: Americans Have Lost $1 Billion to Crypto Scams Since Last Year, Feds Say
news.description: Investing in Web3, the supposedly “transformative” environment of blockchain and cryptocurrency technologies, continues to be a revolutionary new way to lose a whole lot of money. Read more...
news.content:

news.title: BoE's Bailey: latest crypto turmoil reinforces concerns - Reuters.com
news.description: Bitcoin's slump on Monday after major U.S. crypto lending company Celsius Network froze withdrawals should remind investors that most crypto-assets have no intrinsic value, Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said.
